Question: Apex.AI, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Apex.AI, Inc.

Apex.OS®

- Breakthrough, safety-certified, developer-friendly, and scalable software for mobility systems
- Software development kit that abstracts complexity away from developers
- Enables innovators to develop software faster at a lower cost and with smaller effort

Apex.Grace™

- Delivers optimal vehicle communication and high-performance data transport for all use cases
- Integration with AURIX™ TC3x microcontroller to expedite software-defined vehicle development

Apex.Ida™

- Key enabler to adopt software-centric development
- Lean organization with a small, efficient core team and high expertise
- Single software repository for all vehicle lines
Summary_cn:
Apex.AI, Inc.

Apex.OS®

- 创新的、经过安全认证的、开发者友好的、可扩展的移动系统软件
- 软件开发工具包，抽象了开发者的复杂性
- 使创新者能够更快速、更低成本、更小努力地开发软件

Apex.Grace™

- 为所有用例提供最佳的车辆通信和高性能数据传输
- 与AURIX™ TC3x微控制器集成，加快软件定义车辆的开发

Apex.Ida™

- 促进采用以软件为中心的开发
- 小而高效的核心团队及高专业性的精益组织
- 为所有车型提供单一的软件仓库
